summary: This bill, the 'Transformational Artificial intelligence to Modernize the Economy against Extreme Weather and Wildfires Act (TAME Extreme Weather and Wildfires Act)', directs the National Oceanic and Atmospheric Administration (NOAA) to utilize artificial intelligence (AI) to improve weather forecasting, particularly focusing on extreme weather and wildfires. It mandates the development of AI weather models, training datasets, and advanced AI applications. The bill also establishes programs for technical assistance, partnerships, workforce development, and data access related to AI in weather forecasting and fire environment modeling. The goal is to enhance public understanding, preparedness, and resilience, while minimizing environmental impacts.
